long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SEO Meta Show - Chrome Extension Description
Title: SEO Meta Show

Short Description: Displays the meta title and description of the current webpage. It also collects headers, links, social info, analyzes keywords, checks readability, and gathers contact info.

Full Description:

SEO Meta Show is a powerful Chrome extension designed to provide comprehensive SEO insights for any webpage. Whether you're an SEO professional, web developer, or content creator, this tool will help you gather and analyze crucial SEO elements efficiently.

Features:

Meta Information:

Quickly view the meta title and description of the current webpage.
Collect and store meta information for multiple pages.
Full SEO Report:

Gather a detailed report including meta tags, keywords, canonical URLs, robots tag, author, publisher, and language information.
Headers Information:

Collect all headers (H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6) on the page to analyze the structure and hierarchy.
Links Information:

Collect and analyze all links on the page, including href, text, rel, and target attributes.
Images Information:

Gather details on all images, including filename, alt text, title, caption, description, and size.
Social Information:

Collect Open Graph and Twitter card meta tags to ensure social media optimization.
Contact Information:

Automatically detect and collect available telephone numbers and email addresses on the webpage.
Keyword Analysis:

Analyze the most frequently used keywords on the page to help optimize content.
Readability Check:

Check the readability of the page content using the Flesch-Kincaid readability score.
Clipboard Integration:

Easily copy all collected information to the clipboard for further analysis and reporting.
Clear Data:

Clear all collected data with a single click to start fresh.
How to Use:

Install the Extension: Add SEO Meta Show to your Chrome browser from the Chrome Web Store.
Open a Webpage: Navigate to any webpage you want to analyze.
Click the Extension Icon: Open the extension from the toolbar to view and collect SEO information.
Use the Tabs: Switch between different tabs to view and collect meta, headers, links, images, social info, contact info, and more.
Analyze and Optimize: Use the collected data to make informed decisions about your SEO strategies.
Permissions Required:

activeTab: To access the currently active tab in your browser.
scripting: To execute scripts on the currently active tab to collect necessary data
.
Privacy Policy:
SEO Meta Show does not collect any personally identifiable information. All data collected is stored locally on your device and is not shared with any third parties.

Install SEO Meta Show today and take your SEO efforts to the next level with ease and efficiency!
